title: Kalchef
author: Kalchef
content: I am trying to get some SUI airdrop, since this project is from the mysten lab, I believe this project will be big, I have a friend that told me to start using crew3.xyz to participate and get some point to be able to get free SUI token but I am not sure how good and safe this platform is, has anyone use this platform before? Are they paying?

comments.author: umbara ardian
comments.body: Quote from: Kalchef on March 27, 2023, 12:03:05 PMI am trying to get some SUI airdrop, since this project is from the mysten lab, I believe this project will be big, I have a friend that told me to start using crew3.xyz to participate and get some point to be able to get free SUI token but I am not sure how good and safe this platform is, has anyone use this platform before? Are they paying? First of all to clarify this, you know SUI has no plans to airdrop to the community. But if you are referring to Crew3 platform then I think it is quite good for people looking for airdrops or bounty programs, however what I observed is that the platform is also having censorship issues quality of participants when the problem of fraud still occurs a lot.

comments.author: merekamo
comments.body: I personally haven't used crew 3. xyz before, but that doesn't mean it's not a legitimate platform. In my opinion, it's just a kind of claim airdrop site, sometimes some don't get paid. The payout is too low. So I'm not interested.

comments.author: StormHawk
comments.body: Sui is not planning to release any token but crew3 devs are working with SuiSwap to release airdrop tokens, if you can find suiswap tasks on the crew3 website do it and keep doing the daily challenges because Suiswap token is officially announced, join their telegram group and be active to get some valid points.

comments.author: Mozzart
comments.body: Quote from: StormHawk on March 27, 2023, 02:54:15 PMSui is not planning to release any token but crew3 devs are working with SuiSwap to release airdrop tokens, if you can find suiswap tasks on the crew3 website do it and keep doing the daily challenges because Suiswap token is officially announced, join their telegram group and be active to get some valid points. you are right now there we can get points for completed tasks and after that these points can be exchanged for project tokens.Before that, I did not take part in such distributions, but the reviews about the platform are quite positive and quite a lot of users take part in the event. So I have no doubts.

comments.author: fvb
comments.body: Sometimes I use this platform if the project is promising. There are sprints for projects where all participants are equal and receive a certain reward if they enter the top 100, for example. Received rewards for such actions

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: Quote from: Kalchef on March 27, 2023, 12:03:05 PMI am trying to get some SUI airdrop, since this project is from the mysten lab, I believe this project will be big, I have a friend that told me to start using crew3.xyz to participate and get some point to be able to get free SUI token but I am not sure how good and safe this platform is, has anyone use this platform before? Are they paying? This airdrop farming is becoming a crowded trade recently and the developers are watching, something tells me they are going to surprise airdrop farmers, SUI is a well-funded project and the tech looks promising but I will advise you to use the Dapps on the chain rather than doing all these social media promotions giving out points, you don't know if the points would be converted into tokens in future.

comments.author: D ltr
comments.body: I use crew3 to take part in bounties and airdrops, but from several events in crew3 I haven't gotten results, different from those on this forum,btw can you provide the SUI airdrop you mean?

comments.author: Iyeman
comments.body: crew3 was just a platform to handle the missions that being given by the platforms or developers. it's not directly paying you with the money. I have been using it since last year and nothing happened with me. it's safe. you meant about suiswap, right? it's caused by suiswap will be airdropping people who were actively working on the crew3 and complete all of mission. You must aware with the fact that if crew3 just like a social platform for me. It offers you bounty task.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: it is quite well known platform, there has been many good projects using this platform but remember that it doesn't guarantee any airdrops whatsoever unless there's clarification from the team itself.but then again you're free to spend your time working on that tasks as long as you know that it's gonna be hella lot of tasks and wouldn't even guarantee you any rewards anyway.but generally,if they did, they'd give you some kind of heads up, like giving you some whitelisting after certain level have reached, etc. the key takeaways are, it's quite famous platform indeed.

comments.author: carlfebz2
comments.body: Quote from: Kalchef on March 27, 2023, 12:03:05 PMI am trying to get some SUI airdrop, since this project is from the mysten lab, I believe this project will be big, I have a friend that told me to start using crew3.xyz to participate and get some point to be able to get free SUI token but I am not sure how good and safe this platform is, has anyone use this platform before? Are they paying? The primary rule when it comes to airdrop is never ever make yourself do make use of your main wallet whenever it does involved on connecting wallet like Metamask.Im much aware about that SUI project which it is indeed true that they arent giving out any airdrops and its been clarified out.About that crew3xyz then i do have those kind of doubtsconsidering that name itself xyz thing is just really just that generic.I cant really just trust up any projects like that having those type of names.Speaking about airdrop as long you arent shelling out money or having kyc then that what it matters.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Yeah these airdrops are becoming extremely saturated. I used ZkSync a few times and from time to time I go to their discord to get help. And every few minutes there is somebody coming in the channel asking "how do I get the airdrop". They basically saw how people made a killing with BLUR and ARB recently, they want to get ZkSync airdrop next.However I am pretty sure it will be more work than its worth unless you are doing extremely large transactions. If you are only doing $50 worth of transactions once a month, I dont think the airdrop will be much. Many got a few thousand ARB tokens because they had like $500K running through their network.

comments.author: topman21
comments.body: Quote from: Kalchef on March 27, 2023, 12:03:05 PMI am trying to get some SUI airdrop, since this project is from the mysten lab, I believe this project will be big, I have a friend that told me to start using crew3.xyz to participate and get some point to be able to get free SUI token but I am not sure how good and safe this platform is, has anyone use this platform before? Are they paying? OP I've never used an airdrop like the one you mentioned. But there is no airdrop of all projects that will bring you success. Few days ago ARB went on an airdrop where people got good profit by joining. With time some projects come which can get good profit if you join them. Besides, most of the airdrops nowadays are very bad natured with no chance of success.

comments.author: Scripture
comments.body: Quote from: Kalchef on March 27, 2023, 12:03:05 PMI am trying to get some SUI airdrop, since this project is from the mysten lab, I believe this project will be big, I have a friend that told me to start using crew3.xyz to participate and get some point to be able to get free SUI token but I am not sure how good and safe this platform is, has anyone use this platform before? Are they paying? The airdrop season is getting hyped again, and as far as I know SUI will have no airdrop so don't expect for that.Also, you have to be more careful on choosing the project because not all those who claim to have an airdrop is worth trying, most probably they are just riding with the hype so better to do your own research as well about the project and see its true potential. Be careful with the fake project and fake airdrop, you might be giving too much information to them that can result to a collapse of your own wallet.

comments.author: Lainta
comments.body: it's always important to exercise caution when participating in airdrops or any other kind of crypto-related activity online. Do your own research, read reviews from other users, and make sure you fully understand the risks involved. Good luck!

comments.author: StarKay
comments.body: Quote from: Kalchef on March 27, 2023, 12:03:05 PMI am trying to get some SUI airdrop, since this project is from the mysten lab, I believe this project will be big, I have a friend that told me to start using crew3.xyz to participate and get some point to be able to get free SUI token but I am not sure how good and safe this platform is, has anyone use this platform before? Are they paying? I am also new to Crew3 and I observed that their are thousands of accounts registered on the platform, so it is not easy to reach the top 20 or 50 position and qualify for rewards.However for Sui, they said every XP earned will be converted to Sui points which qualifies one for their airdrop, I'll advise you to join and connect with a new account. In this particular case, you will even need a new Sui wallet to claim your airdrop.

comments.author: Pelana vreo
comments.body: Quote from: Kalchef on March 27, 2023, 12:03:05 PMI am trying to get some SUI airdrop, since this project is from the mysten lab, I believe this project will be big, I have a friend that told me to start using crew3.xyz to participate and get some point to be able to get free SUI token but I am not sure how good and safe this platform is, has anyone use this platform before? Are they paying? I often use the platform to get NFT and yes, all the tasks you complete will be rewarded with points, when your points and level have gone up, you can get your reward from the projects.I just completed some tasks from Galoswap on crew3 and the platform is working fine. I can claim the NFT according to the instructions.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: Kalchef on March 27, 2023, 12:03:05 PMI am trying to get some SUI airdrop, since this project is from the mysten lab, I believe this project will be big, I have a friend that told me to start using crew3.xyz to participate and get some point to be able to get free SUI token but I am not sure how good and safe this platform is, has anyone use this platform before? Are they paying? They don't pay anything, because this platform doesn't hold any tokens, it just provides an opportunity to be active in certain projects by connecting your social networks and your wallet, via web3. SUI promises to be very generous, but if you complete all the tasks in crew3, it doesn't mean you get paid anything. In addition to crew3, SUI also has various activities, including signing up for various services, participating in testnetworks, and more.
